patthana16.91:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ pariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.91:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.91:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.91:5.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naapariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.91:5.6: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
